prompt: Create a pitch deck for: Uber but for pet rocks

slides.title: The Rock Bottom Problem
slides.content: Every year, 92% of pet rocks are abandoned due to lack of emotional validation. Current solutions like 'talking to gravel' and 'pebble meditation' are fragmented, analog, and lack blockchain. The $7.8T companionship economy is ripe for disruption.

slides.title: RockUber: AI-Powered Pebble Logistics
slides.content: Our patent-pending RockStackTM API uses quantum machine learning to match rocks with ideal owners. Features include real-time pebble tracking, NFT adoption certificates, and EmotionSyncTM AI that tweets existential musings from your rock's perspective.

slides.title: $420B Total Addressable Sediment
slides.content: We're targeting three verticals: 1) Millennial guilt buyers (47M users) 2) Post-apocalyptic preppers stockpiling silicon companions 3) Web3 DAOs needing mineral-based governance tokens. Just 0.0001% market penetration makes us 3x more valuable than Chewy.

slides.title: Monetizing the Lithosphere
slides.content: Revenue streams include: - $99/month RockPrime subscription (free obsidian upgrades) - In-app geode purchases - Surge pricing during earthquakes - RockCoinTM (ERC-20 token backed by metaphysical vibes)

slides.title: Vision: A World Where Every Boulder Belongs
slides.content: With $50M Series Z funding, we'll: 1) Launch MoonRocksTM (helium-filled for lunar compatibility) 2) Acquire TikTok's rock ASMR community 3) Achieve sentience via our GPT-7 Powered PebbleOSTM. Join us in revolutionizing mineral-to-human empathy before we lithify your FOMO.
